remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別被提供要在建立的自訂集合型別完全支援資料繫結，將變更通知，屬性失效，以及其內容的動畫。This class is provided to enable the creation of custom collection types that fully support data binding, change notification, property invalidation, and animation of its contents. ### FreezableCollection 的 XAML 用法XAML Usage for FreezableCollection 支援有限[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法。 supports a limited [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. - 您可以在根化為物件項目，理論上指定不受限制物件項目，也必須指定[X:typearguments 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md)宣告條件約束。As an object element at the root, you can theoretically specify an unconstrained object element, which must also specify the [x:TypeArguments Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md) to declare the constraint. 不過，這是不常見的案例中，因為若要這樣做，必須是根項目。However, this is not a common scenario, because to do this, the must be the root element. 因為有這項限制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作中的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]可以只支援[X:typearguments 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md)當它所要設定的元素是根項目，而且您必須使用在任何開啟如果您想要具現化泛型型別中的條件約束泛型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This limitation exists because the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] can only support [x:TypeArguments Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md) when the element it is being set on is the root element, and you must use on any open constraint generic if you want to instantiate a generic type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 也不太可能，您想要的根項目，甚至成為鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。It is unlikely that you want a as the root element, even as loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. - 如果您衍生自和套用衍生的集合中的類型條件約束，請在衍生的集合可以支援各種不同的使用方式。If you derive from and apply a type constraint in the derived collection, the derived collection can support a variety of usages. 這可能是因為您衍生中的條件約束，就不需要傳遞。This is possible because the constraint in your derivation eliminates the need to pass . - 一般[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]這類衍生集合的使用方式是透過隱含的集合語法。The typical [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage for such a derived collection is through implicit collection syntax. 若要指定做為物件元素的集合本身不需要支援特定介面的集合。Collections that support certain interfaces do not need to specify the collection itself as an object element. 如需有關集合中的語法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，請參閱 < [XAML 語法詳細資料](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For details on collection syntax in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 比方說，*物件*具有*屬性*位置*屬性*類型受到可以支援下列語法：For instance, an *object* with a *property* where the *property* was of type constrained by could support the following syntax: ``` ``` - 只要您不要隱藏預設的建構函式，將衍生的集合也可以支援 （其中的物件項目是明確的而不是隱含的使用方式，如上所示） 的物件元素語法。As long as you do not hide the default constructor, the derived collection can also support an object element syntax (where the object element is explicit, as opposed to the implicit usage shown above). 它不需要是根項目。It does not need to be the root element. 或者，您也可以使用當做根項目，衍生的集合，而不需要指定此項目，雖然使用集合做為根項目並不常見。Or, you can also use the derived collection as a root element, without needing to specify , although using a collection as a root element is uncommon. - 在上述案例集合中的任何子項目必須是其中一個實作條件約束，或所指定的型別。Any child elements of the collection in either of the above scenarios must be of the type of either the implemented constraint, or as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業執行的淺層複本上指定的集合;只複製集合的項目參考，則不會複製項目本身。This operation performs a shallow copy on the specified collection; only references to the collection's elements are copied, the elements themselves are not cloned. 修改新的項目也會修改針對該項目`collection`。Modifying an element of the new also modifies that element for `collection`. 這些項目會放在新它們會讀取指定之集合的列舉值的順序相同。The elements are placed in the new in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿呼叫這個方法，直接 （只是呼叫基底實作中）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 這個方法會在內部呼叫，每當的新執行個體建立。This method is called internally by , whenever a new instance of the is created. ## Examples 下列範例示範的典型實作。The following example shows a typical implementation of . [!code-csharp[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/CSharp/freezablesample.cs#createinstancecoreexample)] [!code-vb[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/visualbasic/freezablesample.vb#createinstancecoreexample)]
